name: Emoji
description: The component is for emoji selection.

properties.name: disabled
properties.label: Disabled
properties.settingTooltip: This setting allows you to disable the component.
properties.handlerDescription: This handler allows you to disable the component.

properties.name: buttonColor
properties.label: Button Color
properties.settingTooltip: This setting allows you to specify the color of the button.
properties.handlerDescription: This handler allows you to specify the color of the button.

properties.name: buttonSize
properties.label: Button Size
properties.settingTooltip: This setting allows you to specify the button size.
properties.handlerDescription: This handler allows you to specify the button size.

properties.name: dropdownHeight
properties.label: Dropdown List Height
properties.settingTooltip: This setting allows you to specify the dropdown list height.
properties.handlerDescription: This handler allows you to specify the dropdown list height.

properties.name: dropdownWidth
properties.label: Dropdown List Width
properties.settingTooltip: This setting allows you to specify the dropdown list width.
properties.handlerDescription: This handler allows you to specify the dropdown list width.

properties.name: dropdownPosition
properties.label: Dropdown List Position
properties.settingTooltip: This setting allows you to select the position of the dropdown.
properties.handlerDescription: This handler allows you to select the position of the dropdown.

properties.name: theme
properties.label: Theme
properties.settingTooltip: This setting allows you to select a theme for the emoji dropdown list.
properties.handlerDescription: This handler allows you to select a theme for the emoji dropdown list.

properties.name: emojiStyle
properties.label: Emoji Style
properties.settingTooltip: This setting allows you to select an emoji style.
properties.handlerDescription: This handler allows you to select an emoji style.

properties.name: searchDisabled
properties.label: Search Disabled
properties.settingTooltip: This setting allows you to disable the emoji search field.
properties.handlerDescription: This handler allows you to disable the emoji search field.

eventHandlers.name: onEmojiSelect
eventHandlers.label: On Emoji Select Event
eventHandlers.handlerDescription: This event is triggered when an emoji is selected.
